var lineNames = []

for (var index = 0; index < stations.length - 1; index++) {
    if (lineNames.indexOf(stations[index].category) == -1) {
        lineNames.push(stations[index].category)
    }
}

var legend = [
    {
        data: lineNames 
    }
]

var categories = lineNames.map(lineName => {
    return {
        name: lineName
    }
})

myChart.on('click', function (params) {
    console.log(params);
});

option = {
    title: {
        text: '成都地铁示意图'
    },
    color: ['#EE1822', '#85C73F', '#FDD303', '#4E2C8D', '#8F57A2', '#D7156B', '#F26F1F', '#009DD7', '#67CCF6', '#B8A8CF', '#7C1F31', '#54ae11', '#E77DAD', '#78d6cd', '#bc796f'],
    tooltip: {},
    legend: legend,
    animationDurationUpdate: 1500,
    animationEasingUpdate: 'quinticInOut',
    series: [
        {
            type: 'graph',
            layout: 'none',
            symbolSize: 6,
            focusNodeAdjacency: true,
            roam: false,
            label: {
                    show: true,
                    rotate: '30', 
                    color: 'black',
                    position: 'right'
            },
            edgeSymbol: ['none', 'none'],
            edgeSymbolSize: [4, 6],
            edgeLabel: {
                normal: {
                    textStyle: {
                        fontSize: 20
                    }
                }
            },
            data: stations,
            links: links,
            categories: categories,
            lineStyle: {
                normal: {
                    opacity: 0.9,
                    width: 6,
                    curveness: 0
                }
            }
        }
    ]
}
